value.title: AI-supported screenings increase breast cancer detection by 20%, study says
value.excerpt: The group whose scans were assisted by AI found 20% more cancers than the group without AI assistance. However, this doesn’t mean hospitals will let a computer determine whether a patient has cancer any time soon. The authors of the study say there is still a lot more research to do.
